name: The Parallelogram Pirates of Perpendicular Pain
name_original: The Parallelogram Pirates of Perpendicular Pain
description:
The Parallelogram Pirates of Perpendicular Pain starring in The Lost Hidden Tales of the Rectangular Boogaloo: Rocking Revenge of the Beautifully Boxy Buccaneers² A Dish Best Served Cubed

A simple ship builder where you make a ship out of blocks and fight circles for money.

Build Mode:

WASD - move camera

Double-click - Place tile (Janky, just keep trying)

Right-Click - Remove tile

Fight mode:

WASD - movement

Escape/tab/p - pause

Arrow keys - fire in direction (Based on original orientation)

Defeat endless waves of space monsters to get money to build a better and better ship!
